snippet.title: Monster DNA | WORLD PREMIERE trailer at The Horror Game Awards 2024
snippet.description:
Monster DNA is a single-player psychological horror game where you create deadly monsters for mysterious clients. But beware… your creations might be the death of you. In this twisted lab, survival depends on your wits. One wrong move, and you could be their next victim.

The surgery section is an essential area in Monster DNA, where we ensure every monster is not only visually impressive but also built to last from within. We treat and implant healthy, functional organs to prepare them for their violent futures. To elevate their capabilities, we provide each monster with a custom heart. These unique hearts grant specialized skills or abilities, amplifying their overall brutality.

WISHLIST: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3204400/Monster_DNA/

#thehorrorgameawards #HorrorGamesShowcase
---
The Horror Game Awards started towards the end of 2022 as a Horror Game of the Year Award set up by two die hard horror game fans. Fourteen content creators made up that year’s jury. It was such a success that in 2023 the jury doubled in size and the awards expanded their scope.

The aim of the awards is simple: to celebrate horror as one of the best genres in video games and to recognise the year’s greatest horror games alongside the developers who make them.

Website: https://thehorrorgameawards.com/
Merch: https://store.thehorrorgameawards.com/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/TheHorrorGameAwards

Discord: https://discord.gg/j8wUUzJQ8D
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HorrorGameAward
Instagram: https://instagram.com/thehorrorgameawards
